eventDecorators.name: SetTokenIssued
eventDecorators.description: Event when owner changes usdt rate.

eventDecorators.name: SetTokenRedeemed
eventDecorators.description: Event when owner changes usdt rate.

functionDecorators.name: getRequiredComponentUnitsForIssue
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves the addresses and units required to mint a particular quantity of SetToken.

parameterDecorators.name: _setToken
parameterDecorators.description: Instance of the SetToken to issue.

returnDecorators.description: uint256[] List of component units required to issue the quantity of SetTokens.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes this module to the SetToken with issuance-related hooks. Only callable by the SetToken's manager. Hook addresses are optional. Address(0) means that no hook will be called.

parameterDecorators.name: _setToken
parameterDecorators.description: Instance of the SetToken to issue.

parameterDecorators.name: _preIssueHook
parameterDecorators.description: Instance of the Manager Contract with the Pre-Issuance Hook function.

functionDecorators.name: issue
functionDecorators.description: Deposits the SetToken's position components into the SetToken and mints the SetToken of the given quantity to the specified _to address. This function only handles Default Positions (positionState = 0).

parameterDecorators.name: _quantity
parameterDecorators.description: Quantity of the SetToken to mint.

functionDecorators.name: redeem
functionDecorators.description: Redeems the SetToken's positions and sends the components of the given quantity to the caller. This function only handles Default Positions (positionState = 0).

parameterDecorators.name: _quantity
parameterDecorators.description: Quantity of the SetToken to redeem.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: Address to send component assets to.

functionDecorators.name: removeModule
functionDecorators.description: Reverts as this module should not be removable after added. Users should always have a way to redeem their Sets.
